com.teaminternational.coe.utils.webdriver

Class ByJavaScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.By
      • com.teaminternational.coe.utils.webdriver.ByJavaScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ByJavaScript
extends org.openqa.selenium.By
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class extends selenium class By and implements method that allow retrieve WebElements by javascript function
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com
    See Also:
    By, Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        JavascriptExecutor object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if context is not JavascriptExecutor or WrapsDriver
        See Also:

      • getElementListFromJsResponse

        private static java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getElementListFromJsResponse(java.lang.Object response)
        Verify response object and trying to get from it list of webElements
        Parameters:
        response - result of javascript execution
        Returns:
        list of WebElement objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if javascript returned not webElement
        See Also:
        WebElement

      • filterOutElementsWithoutCommonAncestor

        private static void filterOutElementsWithoutCommonAncestor(java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> elements,
                                                           org.openqa.selenium.WebElement ancestor)
        Remove from list of WebElements all elements that are not a child of specified element
        Parameters:
        elements - list of WebElements
        ancestor - WebElement that must be parent of elements from first parameter.
